titleStmt.title: SII 14.247: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 247. (A.R. No. 109 of 1908.) TIRUPPATTŪR, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE maṇḍapa IN THE TIRUTTAḶĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record which is also dated in the 20th year of the king registers the gift of 25 cows and a bull by the wife of Mahāmātra Periyāḻvāṉ of Būdaṉūr in Marugaḷ-nāḍu, a subdivision of Gēyamāṇikka-vaḷanāḍu, a district of Śōḻa-maṇḍalam. Śūlanāḻikkāl is mentioned as the temple measure.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvanaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallavatevaṟku yāṇṭu 20Āvatu keraḷa ciṅkavaḷanāṭ
ṭu brahmadeyan tirupputtūr śrītaḷi parameśvaraṟku coḻamaṇṭalattuk keyamāṇikkavaḷa nāṭṭu maruka
l nāṭṭup pūtanūr mahāmāttiraṉ periyāḻvāṉ Akamuṭaiyāḷ Amutiṟ piṟantāḷ vaitta tirununtāvi
ḷakku Oṉṟukku nittañ cūlanāḻikkāl Uḻakku ney cantirātittiyaval Aṭṭuvatāka Iṭaiyaṉ ceramāṉ jayaṅ
koṇṭāṉ kaikkoṇṭa cāvā muvāp perum pacu 2 10 5- m Eṟuce 1- m Ivviḷakku Eriya Iṭṭa tarā nilai viḷakku 1- m . Itu
panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 14.247 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
